response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us due to its unique features, high-quality materials, and the time and effort invested into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we're extending an exclusive offer to you at $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive price. Please let us know if you have any questions or need more information about the product.", "product_price": 14000}
